entity:AbyssalCall.NAME: Abyssal Call
entity:AbyssalCall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Add !M! Void cards into your discard pile.
entity:AbyssalCall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

entity:CosmicRay.NAME: Cosmic Ray
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add a Void card into your discard pile.
Void cards into your discard pile.

entity:Grasp.NAME: Grasp
entity:Grasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

entity:Sap.NAME: Sap
entity:Sap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !entity:E! entity:Essence. NL Exhaust.

entity:SilentCoup.NAME: Silent Coup
entity:SilentCoup.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw a card for each unique cost in your hand.
entity:SilentCoup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

entity:TentacleRage.NAME: Tentacle rage
entity:TentacleRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to a random enemy !M! times.

entity:UncoilingTendrils.NAME: Uncoiling Tendrils
entity:UncoilingTendrils.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Transform a common card in your deck. NL Exhaust.

entity:VoidBlast.NAME: Void Blast
entity:VoidBlast.DESCRIPTION: Apply !entity:S! Vulnerable to yourself. Deal !D! damage !entity:M! times. Apply !M! Vulnerable to that target.

entity:BoundlessAether.NAME: Boundless Aether
entity:BoundlessAether.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:A! Artifact. All enemies gain !entity:A! Artifact.
entity:BoundlessAether.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:A! Artifact. Target enemy gains !entity:A! Artifact.

entity:Delirium.NAME: Delirium
entity:Delirium.DESCRIPTION: Apply !entity:F! entity:Flux to all enemies. NL Gain !entity:E! entity:Essence. NL Exhaust.

entity:FluxCapacitor.NAME: Flux Capacitor
entity:FluxCapacitor.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the total entity:Flux on all creatures.

entity:FreneticFind.NAME: Frenetic Find
entity:FreneticFind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:A! Artifact. NL gain a Slimed, Void, Dazed, Burn, and Wound card into your discard pile.

entity:JoinAsOne.NAME: Join As One
entity:JoinAsOne.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:S! entity:Flux. Apply !entity:F! entity:Flux to all enemies.

entity:Ka.NAME: Ka
entity:Ka.DESCRIPTION: Apply !entity:F!. If you have entity:Lu, entity:Chant entity:Lu.

entity:Lu.NAME: Lu
entity:Lu.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. If you have entity:Tu, entity:Chant entity:Tu.

entity:OddsAreSlim.NAME: Odds Are Slim
entity:OddsAreSlim.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:S! Vulnerable and !entity:S! Weak. NL Gain !entity:A! Artifact.

entity:Parry.NAME: Parry
entity:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Gain !B! Block.

entity:Ripple.NAME: Ripple
entity:Ripple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 entity:Flux to all enemies. NL Draw a card.

entity:RipplingGrace.NAME: Rippling Grace
entity:RipplingGrace.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. For each card exhausted, draw a card, gain [E] , gain 1 Block and add a Void card into your discard pile. Exhaust.

entity:Split.NAME: Split
entity:Split.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card and shuffle a copy into your draw pile.

entity:Surge.NAME: Surge
entity:Surge.DESCRIPTION: For each card played this turn, play and Exhaust the top card of your library. NL Exhaust.

entity:Tu.NAME: Tu
entity:Tu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have entity:Ka, entity:Chant entity:Ka.

entity:VoidPulse.NAME: Void Pulse
entity:VoidPulse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a status is drawn, gain [E] and draw a card.
entity:VoidPulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a status is drawn, gain [E] and draw a card.

entity:VoidWeave.NAME: Void Weave
entity:VoidWeave.DESCRIPTION: When you draw a Void card, gain !B! Block.

entity:WarpedForm.NAME: Warped Form
entity:WarpedForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !entity:A! Artifact. At start of turn, apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself.
